page.title: 18YOUTH ACTIVITY, STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: THERE ARE THE FOLLOWING CLUBS FOR YOUNG PEOPLE OF THIS AREA:- BROWNIES - 3 PACKS. GUIDES - 3 PACKS. BEAVERS FOR YOUNG BOYS 6-8 YEARS. CUBS - 2 PACKS. SCOUTS - 2 PACKS. ST. JOHN'S AMBULANCE BRIGADE. 3 SEPARATE YOUTH CLUBS AND THE YOUTH CENTRE WHICH CATERS FOR ALL AGES AND ALSO THE DISABLED. STOCKSBRIDGE 7-12 FOOTBALL CLUB. THE TEAMS PLAY HOME MATCHES ON STOCKSBRIDGE JUNIOR SCHOOL PITCH. THERE ARE THE 'STARLIGHT MAJORETTES', THE PENTAQUA SWIMMING CLUB AND A GYMNASTIC CLUB AT THE SPORTS CENTRE, THE LIBRARY CLUB FOR MODELLING AND DRAWING AND ALSO THE UNDER 5'S CLUB WHERE THE LIBRARIAN READS A STORY FOR ONE HOUR. THE SPORTS CENTRE ORGANISES HOLIDAY ACTIVITIES FOR CHILDREN:- SWIMMING, FOOTBALL, ARCHERY, TRAMPOLINING, TABLE TENNIS AND ROLLER SKATING.
